thing-type.label: PAT02-C Flood Sensor
thing-type.description: Flood Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe flood multisensor PAT02 has flood sensor, based on Z-WaveTM technology.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing the tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the tamper key once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set OFF Level
parameter.description: Setting the BASIC command value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtSetting the BASIC command value <ul&gt<li&gtWhen the flood trigger off(0x00), send the BASIC CC to the group 2.</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set ON Level
parameter.description: Setting the BASIC command value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtSetting the BASIC command value <ul&gt<li&gtWhen the flood trigger on(0xFF), send the BASIC CC to the group 2. </li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Operation Mode
parameter.description: Operation mode. Using bit to control.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtOperation mode. Using bit to control.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtBit0: Disable the Flood function.</li&gt <li&gtBit1: Reserve.</li&gt <li&gtBit2: Reserve.</li&gt <li&gtBit3: not applicable for this device variant, set to 0</li&gt <li&gtBit4: Reserve.</li&gt <li&gtBit5: not applicable for this device variant, set to 1</li&gt <li&gtBit6: Reserve.</li&gt <li&gtBit7: Reserve.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Customer Function
parameter.description: Parameter to set the sensor functions<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtCustomer Function switch using bit control</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtBit 0: Reserve</li&gt <li&gtBit 1: Reserve</li&gt <li&gtBit 2: Reserve</li&gt <li&gtBit 3: Disable send out BASI OFF after flood event cleared <ul&gt<li&gt0: Enable</li&gt <li&gt1: Disable</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit 4: Notification Type <ul&gt<li&gt0: Using Notification Report</li&gt <li&gt1: Using Sensor Binary Report</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit 5: Disable Multi CC in auto report <ul&gt<li&gt0: Enable</li&gt <li&gt1: Disable</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit 6: Disable to report Battery state when the device triggered <ul&gt<li&gt0: Enable</li&gt <li&gt1: Disable</li&gt </ul&gt</li&gt <li&gtBit 7: Reserve</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Auto Report Battery Time
parameter.description: The interval time for auto report the battery level.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the battery level.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Auto Report Flood Time
parameter.description: The interval time for auto report the flood state.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report the flood state.</p&gt <p&gt0 means turn off auto report. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: Auto Report Tick Interval
parameter.description: The interval time for auto reporting each tick.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe interval time for auto report each tick.</p&gt <p&gtSetting this configuration will effect configuration No.10, No.13, No.14 and No.15.</p&gt <p&gtUnits of one minute.</p&gt <p&gtCaution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.</p&gt <p&gtCaution2: The value is unsigned byte</p&gt</p&gt
